rocks.palaiologos.maja
 

  • Uses of MonadicFunction in rocks.palaiologos.maja

    Methods in rocks.palaiologos.maja with parameters of type MonadicFunction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    Maja.arcLength(MonadicFunction df, double a, double b)
    Compute the arc length of a curve defined by the function f(x) and its derivative df(x) on the interval [a, b].
    static double
    Maja.integrateGaussLegendre(MonadicFunction f, double a, double b, int N)
    Integrate a monadic function over a finite interval [a,b] using the Gauss-Legendre quadrature.
    static double
    Maja.integrateSimpson(MonadicFunction f, double a, double b, int N)
    Integrate a monadic function over a finite interval [a,b] using the Simpson rule.
    static double[]
    Maja.integrateTanhSinh(MonadicFunction f, double a, double b, int N, double eps)
    Integrate a monadic function over a finite interval [a,b] using the Tanh-Sinh quadrature, especially useful when singularities or infinite derivatives exist at one or both endpoints.
    static double[]
    Maja.map(MonadicFunction f, double[] tab)
    Map the specified monadic function over an array.
    static double[]
    Maja.map(MonadicFunction f, double[] tab, double[] res)
    Map the specified monadic function over an array, specifying the output array, which may be the same as the input to perform an in-place operation.
    static double
    Maja.newtonRaphson(MonadicFunction f, MonadicFunction df, double x0, double eps)
    Find a root of a monadic function using the Newton-Raphson method.
    static double
    Maja.solidArea(MonadicFunction f, MonadicFunction df, double a, double b)
    Compute the surface area of a solid of revolution created by rotating the function f(x) about the x-axis.
    static double
    Maja.solidVolume(MonadicFunction f, double a, double b)
    Compute the volume of a solid of revolution created by rotating the function f(x) about the x-axis.
